pages.title: Using Metals
pages.text: This section details the various uses of the magical metals.

pages.title: Rods
pages.text: Metal ingots may be used to create $(l:tools/rods)rods$() which can be used to bestow yourself or other players with potion effects.

pages.title: Butterfly Boxes
pages.text: $(l:functional_blocks/butterflyboxes)Butterfly Boxes$() create butterflies which then wander and grow plants.
